name: kyrie
description: Kyrie is a formatting colorizer for Javascript, Typescript, and JSON
author: John Haugeland <stonecypher@gmail.com>

scripts.clean: rimraf docs && rimraf build && rimraf dist && mkdir docs && mkdir build && mkdir dist
scripts.terser: terser -o dist/index.js build/rollup/index.mjs && terser -o dist/index.cjs build/rollup/index.cjs && cp build/rollup/cli.cjs dist/cli.cjs
scripts.site: cp src/html/* docs && cp src/html/.nojekyll docs && cp README.md docs/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run update_madlibs && npm run just_test && npm run typescript && npm run rollup && npm run terser && npm run site && npm run docs
